page.title: 09SHOPPING IN BELLSHILL
page.content: Over the years the number of shops in Bellshill has decreased. No longer are there lots of small shops selling a varied selection of goods,but there are larger ones selling mostly the same items.Of the smaller shops which remain the majority of them are owned by parent companies. Indoor Markets have also appeared. They consist of small privately owned stalls.Much of what they sell is cheap,but of inferior quality. All in all there is a lack of good shops in Bellshill. As the style of shop changes so do the shopping habits.Now usually the whole family goes on a shopping expedition,rather than just the mother of the family.Now instead of buying the food for the day food for the whole week is bought at the one time.
